trans-unit.source: Asynchronously runs one workflow from another.
trans-unit.target: 다른 한 워크플로 비동기적으로 실행 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The InvokeWorkflowActivity first calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity.Invoking> code-beside method, if one is specified.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]InvokeWorkflowActivity 첫 번째 호출에서 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity.Invoking>코드 병행 메서드를 지정 된 경우.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity.Invoking>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this method is used to set up incoming parameters for the workflow instance to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로이 메서드는 호출할 워크플로 인스턴스의 들어오는 매개 변수를 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: InvokeWorkflowActivity then creates and invokes a workflow instance of the specified type, passing the parameters that are provided.
trans-unit.target: InvokeWorkflowActivity 다음 만들고 제공 하는 매개 변수를 전달 지정 된 형식의 워크플로 인스턴스를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: As soon as the workflow is invoked, the InvokeWorkflowActivity finishes immediately.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로가 호출 되는 즉시 InvokeWorkflowActivity는 즉시 완료 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity"> </xref> 클래스 활동의 이름을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
To be added.
To be added.
Gets the <xref:System.Guid> that indicates the newly created workflow instance.
Once the workflow is started the <xref:System.Guid> of the created instance is assigned to the InstanceId property.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로가 시작 되 면는 <xref:System.Guid>만들어진 인스턴스의 InstanceId 속성에 할당 됩니다.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: This property is a bindable property.
The instance can be retrieved in the code-beside.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스는 코드 병행에서 검색할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> that indicates the newly created workflow instance.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity.InstanceId*> property.
To be added.
Occurs before the workflow is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로가 호출 되기 전에 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This event is typically used for setting up workflow invoke parameters.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트는 일반적으로 워크플로를 설정 하기 위한 사용 매개 변수를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity.Invoking"></xref> event.
To be added.
Gets the collection of parameters to bind to.
The parameters in this collection are the parameters required to invoke the child workflow.
trans-unit.target: 이 컬렉션의 매개 변수는 자식 워크플로 호출 하는 데 필요한 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: This collection can only specify inbound parameters.
trans-unit.target: 이 컬렉션은 인바운드 매개 변수만 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Outbound and reference parameters cannot be specified, because the workflow invocation is asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 호출이 비동기적 이므로 아웃 바운드 및 참조 매개 변수를 지정할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBindingCollection"></xref> that contains the parameter bindings for the workflow being called.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBindingCollection"> </xref> 호출 되는 워크플로에 대 한 매개 변수 바인딩을 포함 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBindingCollection"></xref>.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the ParameterBindingsPropertyproperty.
trans-unit.target: 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> 는 ParameterBindingsPropertyproperty를 대상으로 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Determines whether the <xref:System.Type> can be filtered by the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 결정 여부는 <xref:System.Type>워크플로에서 필터링 할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The type that the workflow must filter.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to throw an error if the specified Type cannot be filtered; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>지정된 된 형식을 필터링 할 수 없습니다; 오류를 throw 하려면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref:System.Type> can be filtered; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>하는 경우 지정 된 <xref:System.Type>필터링 되지 않으면, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: type is .
throwonError is .
This indicates that type is a design time type.
trans-unit.target: 이 나타내는 type 는 디자인 시간 형식.

trans-unit.source: type is not the root activity.
Gets a description of the filter being used by the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로에서 사용 중인 필터에 대 한 설명을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The description of the filter being used by the workflow.
Gets or sets the <xref:System.Type> of the workflow to be invoked.
The fully-qualified name of the workflow to be invoked.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity.TargetWorkflow*> property.
To be added.
